protocol.name: P-GSE26199-1
text: VALUE = Gene level values in the matrix table were generated using NimbleScan 2.5 after RMA nomalization.

protocol.name: P-GSE26199-10
protocol.text: Images of all scanned slides were aligned using NimbleScan version 2.5 and pair reports were created using the slide design file provided by Roche NimbleGen. An annotation package for this array was created using the pdInfoBuilder (v.2.4) Bioconductor open access package run in the R statistical framework (R Development Core Team, 2007).

protocol.name: P-GSE26199-11
protocol.text: Seeds of Arabidopsis thaliana (ecotype Col-0) were imbibed at 4 °C with distilled water for 4d to facilitate uniform germination.  The seeds were resuspended in 0.05% agarose after the cold treatment and planted in pots containing Fafard 3B mix (Conrad Fafard, Agawam, MA).  Plants were grown in a Conviron BDW80 walk-in growth chamber under the following growth conditions: 22 °C, 60% relative humidity, a 10 h photoperiod, and 350 μmol m-2s-1 light intensity. Plants were watered as needed and fertilized weekly using 125 ppm N of Jack's Professional

protocol.name: P-GSE26199-12
protocol.text: Total RNA was isolated from 100 mg of tissue using an RNeasy® Mini Kit (Qiagen Inc., CA) according to the manufacturer’s instructions.  An on-column DNase 1 treatment (Sigma-Aldrich) was used during RNA extraction to remove any potential genomic DNA contamination.

protocol.name: P-GSE26199-13
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 6 ug total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-GSE26199-14
protocol.text: Following fragmentation, cRNA was hybridized to the ATH1 Affymetrix slide according to standard protocols (#PM702232; www.affymetrix.com).

protocol.name: P-GSE26199-15
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using the GeneChip Scanner 3000 according to standard protocol #PM702232; www.affymetrix.com.

protocol.name: P-GSE26199-16
protocol.text: All data were analyzed using the limma package in the Bioconductor software (v.2.4). Gene level information for RMA normalized expression values are presented within the matrix for all samples analyzed.

protocol.name: P-GSE26199-17
protocol.text: Fully expanded leaf samples from 4 randomly collected plants per species were harvested at 4 physiological states as determined from prior gas exchange measurements (growth temperature - baseline, photosynthetic optimum, 20% inhibition of optimum and 30% inhibition of optimum). The temperature response curves were created by increasing temperature step-wise (2 °C per 10 mins) from 22 to 42 °C to the desired physiological state and waiting 20-30 mins for photosynthesis to stabilize before sampling. Each curve took 3-4 h to complete.

protocol.name: P-GSE26199-18
protocol.text: Soybean (Glycine max cv.Williams 82), were grown in pots containing Fafard 3B soil.  Plants were grown in a Conviron BDW80 walk-in growth chamber under the following growth conditions: 22 °C, 60% relative humidity, a 10 h photoperiod, and 350 μmol m-2s-1 light intensity. Plants were watered as needed and fertilized weekly using 125 ppm N of Jack's Professional

protocol.name: P-GSE26199-19
protocol.text: Following fragmentation, cRNA was hybridized to the GeneChip Soybean array according to standard protocols (#PM702232; www.affymetrix.com).

protocol.name: P-GSE26199-20
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using the GeneChip Scanner 3000 according to standard protocol (#PM702232; www.affymetrix.com).

protocol.name: P-GSE26199-21
protocol.text: Signal values were determined using GeneChip MAS5.0 algorithm.

protocol.name: P-GSE26199-3
text: ABS_CALL = indicating whether the transcript was present (P), absent (A), or marginal (M)

protocol.name: P-GSE26199-4
protocol.text: For the microarray analysis, fully expanded leaf samples from 4 randomly collected plants per species were harvested at 4 physiological states as determined from prior gas exchange measurements (growth temperature - baseline, photosynthetic optimum, 20% inhibition of optimum and 30% inhibition of optimum). The temperature response curves were created by increasing temperature step-wise (2 °C per 10 mins) from 22 to 42 °C to the desired physiological state and waiting 20-30 mins for photosynthesis to stabilize before sampling. Each curve took 3-4 h to complete.

protocol.name: P-GSE26199-5
protocol.text: Dormant cuttings of black cottonwood (Populus trichocarpa clone 93-968) averaging ~0.5 cm diameter, 25 cm length, and 2-3 buds were rooted using 0.3% IBA and grown in a Conviron BDW80 walk-in growth chamber at 22 °C, 60% relative humidity, a 18 h photoperiod, and 350 μmol m-2s-1 light intensity. Plants were watered as needed and fertilized weekly according 250 ppm N using Jack's professional.

protocol.name: P-GSE26199-6
protocol.text: total RNA was converted to ds cDNA using a SuperScript Double-Stranded cDNA Synthesis Kit (Invitrogen Corp) according to the protocol provided by Roche for NimbleGen high-density microarrays.

protocol.name: P-GSE26199-7
protocol.text: RNase A cleanup, cDNA precipitation and sample labeling were carried out according Roche provided protocol

protocol.name: P-GSE26199-8
protocol.text: Hybridization was performed according to Roche protocols

protocol.name: P-GSE26199-9
protocol.text: Dried slides were scanned using an Agilent Scanner (Agilent Technologies, Santa Clara, CA) with a PMT gain of 100% at 5 µm resolution.
